summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FoodNova food ordering app. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI working with minor authentication persistence issue affecting checkout flow.

integration_issues.issue: Users redirected to login page during checkout despite successful registration/login

passed_tests: Homepage loads with products and packs
Product category filtering (Rice, Oil, Pasta & Noodles)
Add to cart functionality with item count display
Cart drawer opens and shows items
Admin dashboard shows correct stats (2 orders, â‚¦40,500 revenue)
All backend API endpoints (17/17 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication persistence issue where users are redirected to login during checkout despite successful registration. Check JWT token storage and validation in frontend AuthContext.
